name: Bike riding bear - Adult
description:
Quality t-shirt featuring a BMX bike riding bear. Also available in childrens sizes (see listing) and as a bear on a mountain bike. If you'd prefer the mountain bike design please add a note during the paypal checkout process.

Available in your choice of t-shirt and design colour. There are 20 t-shirt colour choices and 27 choices of decoration colour (picture shown is navy with silver chrome design).

See colour choices in under "info" section. Please add your colour choice for the t-shirt and design in the "notes to seller" during the checkout process.

All t-shirts are Fruit of the Loom Premium which at 205gsm are robust and keep their shape well, all t-shirts are 100% cotton.

name: Bike riding bear - Childrens
description:
Children's t-shirt featuring a bear riding a BMX bike design. Also available in adult sizes (see adult listing) and as a bear on a mountain bike. If you'd prefer the bear on a mountain bike instead of a BMX please specify this in the "note to seller" in your paypal payment

Available in your choice of t-shirt and decoration colour. There are 17 t-shirt colour choices (7 for under 3 year olds) and 27 choices of decoration colour.

See the colour choices under the "info section" and please advise me of your choice in the "notes to seller" during the checkout process.

All childrens t-shirts are Fruit of the Loom 100% cotton 165gsm.

name: Birdcage - Ladies
description:
Ladies fit t-shirt featuring birdcage design with diamonte crystal detail. Also available in childrens sizes and as a v-neck top (see listings).

Available in your choice of t-shirt and accent colour. The main design is in either black or white (as appropriate to your t-shirt choice) with the bird and three flowers in your choice of accent colour. Two of the raindrops from the cloud are also picked out with diamonte crystals.

There are 23 t-shirt colour choices and 27 choices of decoration accent colour.

See the colour choices under the "info section" and please advise me of your choice in the "notes to seller" during the checkout process.

All t-shirts are fitted style with soft, stretch fabric (96% cotton, 4% elastane).

name: Monster at breakfast - Childrens
description:
Children's t-shirt featuring a bear riding a BMX bike design. Also available in adult sizes (see adult listing) and as a bear on a mountain bike. If you'd prefer the bear on a mountain bike instead of a BMX please specify this in the "note to seller" in your paypal payment

Available in your choice of t-shirt and decoration colour. There are 17 t-shirt colour choices (7 for under 3 year olds) and 27 choices of decoration colour. NB the t-shirt printed is in yellow with sparkly black design.

See the colour choices under the "info" section, please let me know your choice of t-shirt and design colours by entering it in the "notes to sellers" section in the checkout process.

All childrens t-shirts are Fruit of the Loom 100% cotton 165gsm.

name: Martial artist evolution - Adults
description:
Quality t-shirt featuring a evoltion of the martial artist design. Also available in childrens sizes (just message me). 

Available in your choice of t-shirt and design colour. There are 20 t-shirt colour choices and 27 choices of decoration colour (picture shown is red with cream design).

See colour choices in under "info" section. Please add your colour choice for the t-shirt and design in the "notes to seller" during the checkout process.

All t-shirts are Fruit of the Loom Premium which at 205gsm are robust and keep their shape well, all t-shirts are 100% cotton.
